data.name: Hero_Subtitle
data.value: We design and develop trading systems, real-time dashboards, and risk management tools. Robust, fast, and production-ready applications.

data.name: Services_Subtitle
data.value: From algorithmic trading engines to real-time data platforms. Solutions that adapt to your business.

data.name: Services_TradingDesc
data.value: Backtesting engines, algorithmic trading bots, and broker integrations. Your strategy, automated and optimized.

data.name: Services_APIDesc
data.value: We connect your systems with exchanges, data providers, and financial platforms. Real-time data flows and automatic synchronization.

data.name: Services_DashboardsDesc
data.value: Control panels with live data, performance reports, risk metrics, and alerts that keep you informed instantly.

data.name: Services_ConsultingDesc
data.value: Code audits, architecture design, performance optimization, and guidance to scale your financial platform.

data.name: Services_HostingDesc
data.value: Complete infrastructure management: continuous monitoring, automated backups, and security updates.

data.name: Portfolio_Subtitle
data.value: Working applications you can try right now. Each one solves a real problem in the financial world.

data.name: Portfolio_BacktestDesc
data.value: Test your trading strategies against historical data before risking real capital. Detailed results with professional metrics.

data.name: Portfolio_BacktestF3
data.value: Sharpe, drawdown, win rate and more

data.name: Portfolio_CryptoDesc
data.value: Compare cryptocurrency prices across exchanges instantly and detect arbitrage opportunities automatically.

data.name: Portfolio_RiskDesc
data.value: Calculate optimal position sizes and manage your risk like a professional. Protect your capital on every trade.

data.name: Why_Subtitle
data.value: We combine financial market knowledge with software engineering to create applications that work in the real world.

data.name: Why1_Desc
data.value: Fast, efficient applications that process financial data without delays. Your competitive edge starts with speed.

data.name: Why2_Desc
data.value: Systems designed to run without interruptions. Markets never sleep, neither do your tools.

data.name: Why3_Desc
data.value: Secure architecture by design. Financial data protection, encryption, and industry best practices.

data.name: Why4_Desc
data.value: Your application grows with you. From a working prototype to a platform serving thousands of users.

data.name: CTA_Title
data.value: Have an idea for your financial application?

data.name: CTA_Subtitle
data.value: Tell us about your project. We build the solution you need.
